title: Gaps and Opportunities
body_html:
Gaps and Opportunities

Identified Gaps

  • Event semantics derived from DB deltas can be ambiguous
  • Limited filtering capabilities aligned with Hulyâ€™s hierarchies
  • Separate logs/metrics and duplicated configuration
  • Latency and consistency differences vs. transaction-time triggers

Opportunities

  • Trigger-based events with precise types (issue.status_changed, issue.assigned)
  • Rich, class-aware filtering (projects, components, milestones)
  • Unified API for webhook management in Huly UI
  • Shared observability (metrics, logs, traces)
  • Safer security model (re-use auth, permissions, secret storage)

Next Steps

  • Build integrated models & APIs
  • Implement delivery service with retry and signatures
  • Provide migration and replay tools
